summary:
During my seven year role as a sales manager at “Heineken International”, I developed my
skills in different aspects that made me:
Possess a positive and effective management style with the willingness to
work above and beyond the call of duty
 Able to organize, prioritize and work under extreme pressure, high work load and
deadlines.
 Able to deal perfectly in a multi-cultured work environment.
 Defining opportunities and risks and solving them.
At age 28, I was the youngest retail regional manager in Heineken Egypt’s ever.
 Increasing sales in general with different positions or locations from 35%: 100%
increase regardless of location’s total value.
 Applying a new managerial system (using excel) which is circulated later on all
stores.
 Despite competitor cheap prices, increasing sales 10% and improving customer
service.
 Responsible for training and recruiting 40 people.
